cancelStream(uint256).details: Cancel a stream and refund remaining funds

params.streamId: ID of the stream to cancel

claimRewards().details: Claim accumulated rewards (SUSTAINABLE: only pay what we can afford)

params.duration: Duration of the stream in seconds

getClaimableBalance(uint256).details: Get the claimable balance for a stream

getClaimableRewards(address).details: Get claimable rewards for a user

returns._0: Fee basis points, total fees collected

getRealisticClaimableRewards(address).details: Get REALISTIC claimable rewards (capped by available funds)

returns._0: Total staked, total rewards available, reward rate

updateRewardRate(uint256).details: Update reward rate (per second basis points)

params.newRate: New reward rate in basis points per second

params.streamId: ID of the stream to withdraw from
